input.sentences: after graduation she took many pictures .
she took pictures with her family .
she took pictures with people she knew from school .
it was an exciting day for everyone involved .
output.sentences: She was very excited and had been looking forward to it for a long time.
Both of her parents were able to attend.
Her family and friends came from all over to celebrate with her.
They all had dinner together and had a wonderful time celebrating Susie's success!
